Name: Scream Scream Fruit
Description: Allows you to have a highly destructive voice

Name: Liquid Liquid Fruit
Description: Allows you to create, control, and transform into liquid at will

Name: Hard Hard Fruit
Description: Allows you to make your body hard

Name: Whisper Whipser Fruit
Description: Allows you to talk to animals

Name: Sickle Sickle Fruit
Description: Allows you to slice the air

Name: Sleep Sleep Fruit
Description: Allows ypu to put anyone to sleep

Name: Candy Candy Fruit
Description: Allows you to create, control, and transform into candy syrup at will

Name: Cat Cat Fruit, Model: Cheetah
Japanese_Name: Neko Neko no mi, Model: Cheetah
Description: Allows you to turn into a cheetah

Name: Shroom Shroom Fruit
Description: Allows you to create and control poisonous mushroom spores

Name: Bird Bird Fruit, Model: Eagle
Japanese_Name: Tori Tori no mi, Model: Eagle
Description: Allows you to transform into an eagle

Name: Net Net Fruit
Description: Allows you to create nets from anything that you ingest

Name: More More Fruit
Description: Allows you to increase the size and speed of objects along with your own speed

Name: Cube Cube Fruit
Description: Allows you to turn anything or anyone into a cube with the ability to control the inanimate cubes freely

Name: Mini Mini Fruit
Description: Allows you to shrink

Name: Alpaca Alpaca Fruit
Japanese_Name: Ushi Ushi no mi, Model: Alpaca
Description: Allows you to transform into an alpaca

Name: Grow Grow Fruit
Description: Allows you to grow and control any existing plants

Name: Return Return Fruit
Description: Allows you to make anything or anyone younger

Name: Pet Pet Fruit
Description: Allows you to control anyonw who you can place your collars on

Name: Smelt Smelt Fruit
Description: Allows you to ingest metal to heat up your body and create new objects out said metal

Name: Through Through Fruit
Description: Allows you to pass through any non-living thing

Name: Roll Roll Fruit
Description: Allows you to turn your hands and feet into wheels

Name: Colour Colour Fruit
Description: Allows you to change the colour of anything including yourself

Name: Chain Chain Fruit
Description: Allows you to create and control chains

Name: Gold Gold Fruit
Description: Allows you to telekinetically manipulate any gold that you have come into contact with at any point in time at will, this includes producing more gold than the original content, as long as there was some there to begin with

Name: Luck Luck Fruit
Description: Allows you to manipulate the luck of yourself and others

Name: Viso Viso Fruit
Description: Allows you to create illusions of any picture you touch

Name: Clank Clank Fruit
Description: Allows you to telekinetically disassemble objects and reassemble them into whatever you please

Name: Sing Sing Fruit
Description: Allows you to teleport people's consciousnesses into a virtual space by singing in which you are all powerful
